# Mastella Advisory

> Strategic exit and M&A advisory for founders building companies worth £5M to £50M. Based in London, UK.

## About

Mastella Advisory provides end-to-end M&A advisory services for small to medium enterprises (SMEs). The firm combines decades of traditional M&A expertise with modern technology to make world-class advisory services accessible to founder-led businesses across the UK.

## Core Services

- Exit Planning: Strategic guidance to prepare businesses for sale and maximise exit value
- Deal Execution: End-to-end transaction management from buyer identification to deal closure
- Fundraising: Capital raises from seed to Series A, growth capital, and pre-exit funding
- Business Valuation: Data-driven valuations to establish true business worth
- Executive Search & Interim Solutions: Strategic leadership placement pre and post exit

- Privacy Policy: https://mastellagroup.com/privacy-policy

## Target Audience

Founders and owners of SMEs with revenues between £2M and £50M, or valuations in the £5M to £50M range. This includes founder-led businesses, family-owned companies, and PE-backed firms seeking an exit or capital raise.

## Location

International House, 101 King's Cross Road, London, WC1X 9LP, United Kingdom
